name: A Dog Story (Irrlicht)
description:
A small narrative Bitsy game for the "Candle" Jam. Is a short autobiographic story about a kid and his dog, using the jam theme as a metaphor of the time we spent living.

Usa WASD or arrow keys to move if you are on PC or drag in the direction you want to move if you are on your mobile phone.

Hope you like it!
